verses.roman:
prathama śloke kahi sāmānya maṅgalācaraṇa
dvitīya ślokete kari viśeṣa vandana

synonyms: prathama—first; śloke—in the verse; kahi—I express; sāmānya—general; maṅgala-ācaraṇa—invocation of benediction; dvitīya—second; ślokete—in the verse; kari—I do; viśeṣa—particular; vandana—offering of prayers.
translation: In the first verse I have invoked a general benediction, but in the second I have prayed to the Lord in a particular form.
